Subsection.Text: The board shall establish by rule fees for the following purposes:

Paragraph.Text: Application, a fee not to exceed $50.
Initial licensure, a fee not to exceed $200.
Renewal of licensure, a fee not to exceed $200 biennially.
Renewal of inactive licensure, a fee not to exceed $50.
Reactivation, a fee not to exceed $50.

Subsection.Text: The fees established pursuant to subsection (1) shall be based upon the actual costs incurred by the department in carrying out its responsibilities under this part.
All moneys collected by the department under this part shall be deposited as required by s. 456.025.
